text.div:
BC StageTimingPrefix Logical Model

Mandatory element indicating when the staging was done, in terms of treatment landmarks, either clinical (at diagnosis prior to treatment) (c), pathologic (post-surgical) (p), post-neoadjuvant clinical (yc), or post-neoadjuvant pathologic(yp). The stage timing code is prefix on the N stage. For example, for post-neoadjuvant clinical staging, the N categories are preceded by 'yc' (e.g. ycNX)

name: StageTimingPrefix
title: BC StageTimingPrefix Logical Model
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Mandatory element indicating when the staging was done, in terms of treatment landmarks, either clinical (at diagnosis prior to treatment) (c), pathologic (post-surgical) (p), post-neoadjuvant clinical (yc), or post-neoadjuvant pathologic(yp). The stage timing code is prefix on the N stage. For example, for post-neoadjuvant clinical staging, the N categories are preceded by 'yc' (e.g. ycNX)
